column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Friday August 13 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Richmond/Madison Co - Friday 8/13:
column4: Lancaster Ave between Eastern Bypass and Crabbe St will be closed between 4 pm and 6 pm for an EKU event.

column3: Traffic Alert for Richmond/Madison Co - Friday 8/13:
column4: Motorists will need to find an alternate route during this time.
